name: extract
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to remove or take out something

example.eg: They used to extract iron ore from this site.
example.egtrans: 他们曾在这个地方开采铁矿。

example.eg: The oil which is extracted from olives is used for cooking.
example.egtrans: 这种橄揽油是用于烹饪的。

trans_examp.trans_en: to make someone give you something when they do not want to

example.eg: After much persuasion they managed to extract the information from him.
example.egtrans: 做了大量说服工作后，他们终于从他那儿挖来了情报。

name: extract
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: extract
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a substance taken from a plant, flower, etc. and used especially in food or medicine
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指食物或药物的）提出物，精华，汁

example.eg: The cream contained extracts of/from several plants.
example.egtrans: 这种护肤霜中含有数种植物萃取精华。

dsense.name: extract
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a particular part of a book, poem, etc. that is chosen so that it can be used in a discussion, article, etc.

example.eg: They published an extract from his autobiography.
example.egtrans: 他们刊登了他自传的一个片断。
